Description: Fragment of flattened handle from a Thasian pottery transport amphora. Clay near fine non-micaceous red-brown. Rectangular stamp at top of handle with Greek inscription and seated sphinx symbol.
Curator's comments: Garlan, Y., Les timbres amphoriques de Thasos. 1, Timbres protothasiens et thasiens anciens (Paris 1999) 962
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (JB.0004)
